link.title: Research Article Published in PlosOne Journal

entry.content: Excited to announce our last article, ‚ÄúThe hidden role of buffalo trade network in bovine epidemic spreading,‚Äù is now out in @PLOSONE !üéâ We explore how buffalo farms, often overlooked in cattle disease studies, impact Q fever spread in Italy. Our analysis reveals that despite the significant difference in network sizes, the unique characteristic of Italian buffalo farms makes the buffalo network essential for a comprehensive understanding of bovine disease dynamics in Italy. Read it here.
